'''''The Dark Knight''''' is rumored to be canceled, but yet still somewhat real <ref name="C">[http://www.strategyinformer.com/news/2018/rumour-mill-end-is-nigh-for-pandemics-dark-knight-videogame]</ref> [[video game]] very loosely based on the [[The Dark Knight (film)|film]] of the same name. The game was unofficially announced in the summer of 2007 to be developed by [[Pandemic Studios]] as an [[open world]] [[Batman]] game. No word was said on what kind of experience gamer would have or even which video game systems it would be available for. No word was ever heard again until the months preceding the release of The Dark Knight film. The game was confirmed, albeit not officially, on July 17, 2008 by actor [[Gary Oldman]] during an interview with [[G4 (TV channel)|G4]]'s [[Kristin Holt]].<ref name="g4">[http://www.g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/687343/Dark_Knight_Game_Leaks.html G4 confirms Dark Knight Game]
+
'''''The Dark Knight''''' is rumored to be canceled, but yet still somewhat real <ref name="C">[http://www.strategyinformer.com/news/2018/rumour-mill-end-is-nigh-for-pandemics-dark-knight-videogame]</ref> [[video game]] very loosely based on the [[The Dark Knight (film)|film of the same name]]. The game was unofficially announced in the summer of 2007 to be developed by [[Pandemic Studios]] as an [[open world]] [[Batman]] game. No word was said on what kind of experience gamer would have or even which video game systems it would be available for. No word was ever heard again until the months preceding the release of The Dark Knight film. The game was confirmed, albeit not officially, on July 17, 2008 by actor [[Gary Oldman]] during an interview with [[G4 (TV channel)|G4]]'s [[Kristin Holt]].<ref name="g4">[http://www.g4tv.com/thefeed/blog/post/687343/Dark_Knight_Game_Leaks.html G4 confirms Dark Knight Game]
</ref> It is believed that the game will ship when the movie is released on [[DVD]] and [[Blu-ray]], which is set for December 9, 2008.<ref name="g4"/> Little is currently known about this game, as it is yet to be officially announced.
</ref> It is believed that the game will ship when the movie is released on [[DVD]] and [[Blu-ray]], which is set for December 9, 2008.<ref name="g4"/> Little is currently known about this game, as it is yet to be officially announced.
